txt.en: Anyâmat harbours aspirations of being a great shanty-man.
What if We Fight a Giant Crab?
'What a fearsome beast! Its hands were like spiked gauntlets! You were lucky I was around to help or you'd have been in a lot of trouble.'
Anyâmat thinks it would be a great idea to fight a giant crab named Shelly.\n\nShelly may be found on Baj Khatûg, an island off the eastern shore of Zamarzîr.
Shelly has fallen! Talk to Anyâmat about what to do next.\n\nAnyâmat may be summoned by using Anyâmat's whistle from your inventory. Anyâmat may only be summoned while in and around Zamarzîr.

'I once overheard a sailor tell a story wherein she faced down a ferocious beast. Let us seek out the most horrifying creature these isles have to offer! There is a giant crab on a small island east of here. I hear folks have nicknamed it Shelly. Let's go fight it!'
